snippet: The once unthinkable is on everyone's mind, as Greek politicians fight over honoring the terms of the bailout and Germans insist they will not re-negotiate. What is there left to talk about?
abstract: The once unthinkable is on everyone's mind, as Greek politicians fight over honoring the terms of the bailout and Germans insist they will not re-negotiate. What is there left to talk about?

headline.main: Time for Greece and the Euro to Part Ways?
